forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon is unfolding with a gentle radiance that bathes the city in a pleasant warmth. The skies are a serene canvas painted in rich blue hues, suggesting a day devoid of the typical fog that often cloaks the Golden Gate. Wind whispers through the streets, a companionable breeze blowing from the west-southwest at a brisk pace, keeping both the temperature and spirits uplifted. As the sun slides toward the horizon, temperatures may dip slightly but remain comfortably mild, inviting a leisurely stroll or a spontaneous visit to a local café.

Tonight, skies will transition to a picturesque tapestry of partly cloudy formations, with a still whisper of wind gliding through the evening air. As dusk descends upon the city, those venturing out would do well to don light layers, perhaps a soft jacket to fend off the cooler tones of the evening. Given the inviting conditions, an impromptu gathering with friends at a rooftop bar or a tranquil walk along Embarcadero promises to yield a moment of calm amidst the bustle of city life, with glimpses of silvery waters reflecting the last glimmers of daylight.
